body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Joe Bell and I'm with Auto Transport Co. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Amy Allen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amy. Can you please provide me with your phone number for our records, spelled out digit by digit?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's six five five, two two five, eight three seven two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amy. And could you also provide your email address, spelled out entirely?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's a m y a l l e n at g m a i l dot c o m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that with me. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Amy?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Amy. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day!
